title: Racing teams of NASCAR ranked by revenue 2017
summary: The statistic depicts the by in the teams with the highest NASCAR gaming revenues in 2017 .
The location with the highest ranked Revenue in the U.S. was unsurprisingly the Hendrick_Motorsports Strip , Hendrick_Motorsports totaling 180 million U.S. dollars in NASCAR gaming Revenue in 2017 .
gold: The statistic ranks the racing teams of NASCAR according to revenue in 2017 . Hendrick Motorsports generated 180 million U.S. dollars in revenue in 2017 .
